forgot_password_page.please_enter_email_to_reset_password: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.

delete_account_dialog.dialog_subtitle: Your account and content will be deleted permanently. You may cancel the deletion request by logging in your account within 30 days.

water_page.want_to_reduce_water_intake: Want to reduce your water intake?
water_page.your_hydration_score_still_empty: Your hydration score is still empty
water_page.lets_help_your_body_stay_hydrated: Let's help your body stay hydrated and track your hydration progress by logging your glasses of water today!
water_page.understand_your_hydration: Understand your hydration levels and maintain optimal health by learning your urine color.
water_page.please_reduce_your_water_intake_by_up_to: Please reduce your water intake by up to

water_page.please_keep_your_water_intake_under: Please keep your water intake under
water_page.see_how_do_hydration_score_calculated: See how do hydration score calculated
water_page.youre_doing_well_in_staying_hydrated: You're doing well in staying hydrated! Keep it up by drinking water regularly to maintain optimal health.

wellness_score_page.check_the_app_to_see_what_you_need_to_im: Check the app to see what you need to improve
wellness_score_page.see_how_do_wellness_score_calculated: See how do wellness score calculated
wellness_score_page.need_improvement_description: Recognize the opportunity for improvement in your wellness today. Acknowledge areas needing attention—nutrition, physical activity, mindfulness, or sleep. Our app is here to guide and support you on your journey towards enhanced well-being. Tomorrow is another chance for positive change.
wellness_score_page.balanced_description: Congratulations on achieving balanced wellness today! Your commitment to nutrition, fitness, mindfulness, and quality sleep is commendable. Continue embracing a healthier lifestyle, and let our app be your ongoing guide. Here's to your well-deserved success in cultivating a vibrant, balanced life!
wellness_score_page.excellent_description: Congratulations on reaching excellent wellness today! Your dedication to optimal nutrition, fitness, mindfulness, and rest shines through. Celebrate this achievement and let our app continue to support your journey towards sustained well-being. Here's to your remarkable success in living your best life!
wellness_score_page.track_your_daily_task_to_see_your_wellne: Track your daily task to see your wellness score and insights for today!

weight_page.youre_doing_great_keep_your_spirit_up: You're doing great! Keep your spirit up!
weight_page.disclaimer_description: Projection based on today's food intake. Estimate only.

nutriscore_detail_page.disclaimer_description: Livewell nutritional data is for general fitness and wellness use. May containt inaccuracies. Consult a professional for personalized advice.
nutriscore_detail_page.dont_worry_we_can_improve_nutrition_toge: Don't worry, we can improve nutrition together!
nutriscore_detail_page.youre_doing_great: You're doing great! Keep your spirit up!

streak_page.learning_daily_keeps_your_streak_up: Learning daily keeps your streak up!

onboarding_page.lets_start_by_completing_your_profile: Let's start by completing your profile
onboarding_page.personalized_plan_will_be_crafted_based_: A personalized plan will be crafted based on your current condition
onboarding_page.tell_us_your_name_to_unlock_personalized: Tell us your name to unlock personalized experience
onboarding_page.gender_description: Knowing your gender allows us to provide a more comprehensive picture of your health.
onboarding_page.as_your_body_changes_with_age: As your body changes with age, so do your nutritional needs.
onboarding_page.whats_your_current_weight_height: What's your current weight and height?
onboarding_page.its_essential_for_calculating: It’s essential for calculating your BMI and setting realistic goals.
onboarding_page.help_us_calculate_your_daily_calorie_nee: Help us calculate your daily calorie needs
onboarding_page.moderate_description: LRegular exercise or physically demanding work.
onboarding_page.active_description: Frequent exercise and a high level of daily activity.
onboarding_page.do_you_have_any_allergies: Do you have any allergies, intolerances, or health conditions that affect your diet?
onboarding_page.you_can_answer_no: You can answer “no” if you don't have any.
onboarding_page.example: examples: diabetes, high blood pressure, gluten sensitivity, etc.
onboarding_page.your_personalized_plan_is_ready: Your personalized plan is ready. Let's start your health journey by keeping track of your daily habit.
